text: @BorisJohnson Pity I wasn't there I'd have told you in no uncertain terms that you are a stinking lying prevaricating hypocrite. Strange you should choose a place named "Foxholes" you want to kill foxes as well as the elderly! You were due to visit Kings before #Covid19 but pulled out why?
